name: SpecialOlympicsOhio
0:
”Alexa, open Special Olympics Ohio”
”Alexa ask Special Olympics Ohio for what time is CheckIn for the Summer Games?”
”Alexa ask Special Olympics Ohio for Will the games go on even if the weather is bad?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: special olympics ohio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to know when Opening Ceremonies start or what time the Gymnastics competition begins, just ask Alexa. Alexa will answer 30 questions on the summer games schedule and venue information. Alexa also has info on meal schedules and social activities like dances and Athlete Village.

 

Special Olympics Ohio is part of the global inclusion movement of more than 5 million athletes in 174 countries using sport, health, education, and leadership programs to empower people with intellectual disabilities. Special Olympics Ohio provides year-round sports training and competition in 22 different sports for 22,000 children and adults.

You can ask:

=> What time is Check-In for the Summer Games?
=> When does Athlete Village open?
=> Will the games go on even if the weather is bad? 
=> How much is admission to the State Summer Games? 
=> Can anyone go to watch the State Summer Games?
=> What time do Opening Ceremonies start?
=> When does competition begin for the State Summer Games?
=> What time is dinner on Friday?
=> What time is the dance on Friday?
=> What time is breakfast on Saturday?
=> What time is dinner on Saturday?
=> What time is the dance on Saturday?
=> What time is breakfast on Sunday?
=> What time does Track (and Field) competition start on Saturday?
=> What time does Bocce competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Bowling competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Cycling competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Gymnastics competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Powerlifting competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Roller Skating competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Soccer competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Swimming competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Tennis competition begin on Saturday?
=> What time does Volleyball competition begin on Saturday?
=> When is the Souvenir Shop open?
=> When will Healthy Athletes be open?
=> What time will there be Healthy Athletes screenings?
=> What events are being held on Sunday?
=> What does Special Olympics do?
=> How can I become a Special Olympics Ohio athlete?
=> How old does a child have to be to participate in Special Olympics?
